config:

model = dict(
    type='EncoderDecoder',
    pretrained=None,
    backbone=dict(
        type='UNet',

        base_channels=64,

        strides=(1, 1, 1, 1, 1),
        enc_num_convs=(2, 2, 2, 2, 2),
        dec_num_convs=(2, 2, 2, 2),
        downsamples=(True, True, True, True),
